safetyTips: Please ask directly if any concerns
name: Coastal Crystals
description: We retail a large variety of crystals, gifts & homeware. We've been at lots of events over the past 4 years and have now also moved online.  We are based in Kingsdown, Kent and are offering free contactless delivery within 10 miles (on the same day where possible). Please take a look at our website to see our range of goodies!
